entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
